languages.text: Плоть трупа кристаллизовалась и превратилась в полупрозрачный саркофаг, внутри которого заточена жижа из растворившихся органов.

traits.locale_text: Плоть трупа кристаллизовалась и превратилась в полупрозрачный саркофаг, внутри которого заточена жижа из растворившихся органов.

languages.text: The corpse's flesh has crystallised and turned into a translucent sarcophagus, and sealed within is the slop of their putrefying organs.
languages.original_text: Плоть трупа кристаллизовалась и превратилась в полупрозрачный саркофаг, внутри которого заточена жижа из растворившихся органов.

traits.locale_text: The corpse's flesh has crystallised and turned into a translucent sarcophagus, and sealed within is the slop of their putrefying organs.
The corpse's flesh has crystallised and turned into a translucent sarcophagus, and sealed within is the slop of their putrefying organs.
The corpse's flesh has crystallised and turned into a translucent sarcophagus, and sealed within is the slop of their putrefying organs.
The corpse's flesh has crystallised and turned into a translucent sarcophagus, and sealed within is the slop of their putrefying organs.

languages.text: 尸体的肉质已经结晶，变成了一个半透明的棺柩，里面封存着腐烂的器官与体液。
languages.original_text: The corpse's flesh has crystallised and turned into a translucent sarcophagus, and sealed within is the slop of their putrefying organs.

traits.locale_text: 尸体的肉质已经结晶，变成了一个半透明的棺柩，里面封存着腐烂的器官与体液。

languages.text: La carne del cadáver ha cristalizado y formado un sarcófago translúcido en cuyo interior puedes ver el líquido formado por sus órganos putrefactos.
languages.original_text: The corpse's flesh has crystallised and turned into a translucent sarcophagus, and sealed within is the slop of their putrefying organs.

traits.locale_text: La carne del cadáver ha cristalizado y formado un sarcófago translúcido en cuyo interior puedes ver el líquido formado por sus órganos putrefactos.

languages.text: 死体の肉は結晶化して半透明の棺となり、中には腐敗により溶解した臓器が封入されている。
languages.original_text: The corpse's flesh has crystallised and turned into a translucent sarcophagus, and sealed within is the slop of their putrefying organs.

traits.locale_text: 死体の肉は結晶化して半透明の棺となり、中には腐敗により溶解した臓器が封入されている。

languages.text: Das Fleisch der Leiche ist kristallisiert und zu einem durchscheinenden Sarkophag geworden, in dessen Innerem die Masse der verfaulenden Organe versiegelt ist.
languages.original_text: The corpse's flesh has crystallised and turned into a translucent sarcophagus, and sealed within is the slop of their putrefying organs.

traits.locale_text: Das Fleisch der Leiche ist kristallisiert und zu einem durchscheinenden Sarkophag geworden, in dessen Innerem die Masse der verfaulenden Organe versiegelt ist.

languages.text: La chair cristallisée des cadavres s'est transformée en un sarcophage translucide dans lequel sont enfermés leurs organes progressivement rongés par la putréfaction.
languages.original_text: The corpse's flesh has crystallised and turned into a translucent sarcophagus, and sealed within is the slop of their putrefying organs.

traits.locale_text: La chair cristallisée des cadavres s'est transformée en un sarcophage translucide dans lequel sont enfermés leurs organes progressivement rongés par la putréfaction.

languages.text: Cesedin eti kristalize olup yarı saydam bir lahde dönüşmüş. İçine de çürümekte olan iç organlardan oluşan bir lapa kapatılmış.
languages.original_text: The corpse's flesh has crystallised and turned into a translucent sarcophagus, and sealed within is the slop of their putrefying organs.

traits.locale_text: Cesedin eti kristalize olmuş ve yarı saydam bir lahite dönüşmüş, içine çürümekte olan iç organlardan oluşan bir lapa kapatılmış.
